displayName.japanese: レースは一つ、世界も一つ

description.english: Complete your first multiplayer race
description.german: Beende dein erstes Mehrspieler-Rennen
description.french: Terminez votre première course en multijoueur
description.italian: Completa la tua prima gara multigiocatore
description.spanish: Completa tu primera carrera multijugador.
description.japanese: 初めてのマルチプレイヤーレースをクリア
description.brazilian: Complete sua primeira corrida multijogador.

displayName.japanese: 選手権は一つ、世界も一つ

description.english: Complete a multiplayer Championship

description.brazilian: Complete um campeonato multijogador.

description.english: Get a Holeshot in any game mode
